DUAL LICENSE NOTICE  
===================

This project is distributed under a dual-license system:

1. All **software code** (including application logic, scripts, back-end code, front-end code, and tooling)
   is licensed under the **GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 (AGPL-3.0)**.

2. All **non-code content** (including educational assignments, exercises, explanations, textual content,
   worksheets, images, PDFs, and other media) is licensed under the
   **Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0)**.

Unless stated otherwise in a file header, this division applies by default:
- Files in `/src`, `/server`, `/client`, `/app`, `/scripts`, and similar directories fall under **AGPL-3.0**.
- Files in `/content`, `/assignments`, `/docs`, `/assets`, `/media`, `/static`, and similar directories fall under **CC BY-NC-ND 4.0**.

If a file contains an explicit license header, that header overrides the default.
